caseTitle: Miss Kulsum Khaliq v. The Election Commission of Pakistan, Islamabad & others
tagline: Leave  to  appeal  is  granted to examine as to whether respondent-candidate is not disqualified under Article 63(1)(o) of the Constitution from contesting elections as admittedly he had paid government dues towards Social Security for over six months at the time of filing of his nomination papers. Meanwhile, he is restrained from contesting elections.
